articles.title: Mexican border crossings are down 50% since Title 42 expiration, homeland security chief says - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. border patrol agents have seen a 50% drop in the number of migrants crossing the border since the pandemic-era immigration policy known as Title 42 …
articles.content: WASHINGTON, May 14 (Reuters) - U.S. border patrol agents have seen a 50% drop in the number of migrants crossing the border since the pandemic-era immigration policy known as Title 42 expired at midn… [+759 chars]

articles.author: Christine Rousselle
articles.title: On this day in history, May 14, 1973, Skylab, the first US space station, is launched - Fox News
articles.description: Skylab, America's first space station, was launched into orbit on this day in history in 1973. The space station was damaged during liftoff, but the astronauts repaired it.
articles.content:
America's first space station, Skylab, launched into Earth's orbit on this day in history, May 14, 1973.
The unmanned space station blasted into space on a modified Saturn V rocket at Florida's Kenn… [+4507 chars]
